meanings: (절약하다) save (on), economize (on); (돈을) be thrifty, be frugal
(소중히 여기다) prize, value, treasure, cherish, hold (sth) dear
write a book, making the best of the odd moments saved from one´s regular work
If you save something too much, it will become dung

meanings.meaning: lose[spoil] the ship for a ha'p'orth of tar
spoil the ship for a coat of tar
flat out as a lizard drinking

examples.korean: They scrimped and saved to buy a house. 발음듣기 그들은 아끼고 아껴서 집을 샀다 Neungyule
examples.english: They scrimped and saved to buy a house. 발음

examples.korean: If he spoil the ship for a coat of tar, he must be silly. 발음듣기 만약 그가 기와 한 장을 아껴서 대들보를 썩힌다면 그는 어리석은 사람이다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If he spoil the ship for a coat of tar, he must be silly. 발음

examples.korean: Europeans was parsimonious with energy at least until the discovery of North Sea oil. 발음듣기 유럽 사람들은 최소한 북해유전이 발견되기 전까지는 에너지를 아껴서 사용했다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Europeans was parsimonious with energy at least until the discovery of North Sea oil. 발음

examples.korean: Migrating geese fly in the familiar V-formation because it reduces air resistance, which conserves energy during flight by allowing the geese to glide more often, and thus fly longer distances. 발음듣기 기러기는 공기 저항을 줄일 수 있는 V자형으로 나는데, 이는 기러기가 날갯짓을 하지 않고 공기의 흐름을 이용해 날도록 함으로써 나는데 소요되는 에너지를 아껴서 보다 더 오래 날 수 있게 해준다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Migrating geese fly in the familiar V-formation because it reduces air resistance, which conserves energy during flight by allowing the geese to glide more often, and thus fly longer distances. 발음

examples.korean: Without giving too much away he won tens of thousands first time around. 발음듣기 말을 아껴서 짧게 말하자면, 그는 첫 판에 수 천을 벌어들였다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 미니the정(kmjs****) Web Collection
examples.english: Without giving too much away he won tens of thousands first time around. 발음
